reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For atmosphere, great food, and excellent service, the Hotel New Matsumi is the place to stay in Beppu.
reviews.title: Incredible Onsen. Great Place to Stay!

reviews.text: A 15 minute walk from the Beppu train station, this older hotel has nice sized rooms, modern amenities, and the nicest onsen I've ever bathed in. The outdoor onsen, on the sixth floor of the hotel, boasts an incredible view of the ocean. I visited at sunrise, and soaking while watching the sun come up was truly amazing.
reviews.title: Watched the sunrise bathing in an outdoor onsen
